text:
*[Bug 18131] Update po/POTFILES*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18131>

Sebastian Meyer (<mailto:seb.meyer@fau.de|seb.meyer@fau.de>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
             Status|UNCONFIRMED                 |CLOSED
         Resolution|---                         |FIXED
                 CC|                            |seb.meyer@fau.de
            Summary|Add src/unix/sys-std.c to   |Update po/POTFILES
                   |po/POTFILES                 |

--- Comment #1 from Sebastian Meyer (<mailto:seb.meyer@fau.de|seb.meyer@fau.de>) ---
Updates to POTFILES have been committed a while ago in c84300, including the
additions from the patch (attachment 2860, except for `src/nmath/qgamma.c`,
deliberately).

(I have still fixed the title: it did not match the actual patch and
`src/unix/sys-std.c` has been listed in `po/POTFILES` already since 2005.)
